author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: ای اهل عالم مذهب الهی از برای محبّت و اتّحاد است او را سبب عداوت و اختلاف منمائيد * نزد صاحبان بصر و اهل منظر اکبر آنچه سبب حفظ و علّت راحت و آسايش عباد است از قلم اعلی نازل شده و لکن جهّال ارض چون مربّای نفس و هوسند از حکمتهای بالغه حکيم حقيقی غافلند و بظنون و اوهام ناطق و عامل *
translation: O ye that dwell on earth! The religion of God is for love and unity; make it not the cause of enmity or dissension. In the eyes of men of insight and the beholders of the Most Sublime Vision, whatsoever are the effective means for safeguarding and promoting the happiness and welfare of the children of men have already been revealed by the Pen of Glory. But the foolish ones of the earth, being nurtured in evil passions and desires, have remained heedless of the consummate wisdom of Him Who is, in truth, the All-Wise, while their words and deeds are prompted by idle fancies and vain imaginings.
